stevecollie.github.io
=====================



## Basic Site Map:
* About/Bio
* Blog
* Resume
* Project Portfolio

### About/Bio
* A picture of me
* Short overview of what I'm doing right now
* short history of what I've done.

### Blog

* Standard Jekyll Blog (v2 of the site)

### Resume

* Contact Information
* Work history
* Education
* Community Involvement
* Selected Projects

### Project Portfolio

* A list of projects
* when I click on a project, I see more details
